remedies_dict.flu: Get plenty of rest and fluids. Over-the-counter medications like acetaminophen or ibuprofen can help relieve symptoms.
remedies_dict.cold: Drink plenty of fluids and get lots of rest. Over-the-counter medications like decongestants or pain relievers can help relieve symptoms.
remedies_dict.migraine: Lie down in a dark, quiet room and apply a cold compress to your forehead. Over-the-counter medications like ibuprofen or aspirin can help relieve symptoms.
remedies_dict.food poisoning: Drink plenty of fluids to prevent dehydration. Avoid solid foods until the vomiting and diarrhea have subsided. Contact a doctor if your symptoms are severe or don't improve after a few days.
remedies_dict.allergies: Avoid triggers that cause your allergies. Over-the-counter medications like antihistamines or nasal sprays can help relieve symptoms.
remedies_dict.heart attack: Call 911 or go to the emergency room immediately. Do not attempt to treat a heart attack at home.
remedies_dict.asthma: Use a rescue inhaler as directed. Avoid triggers that cause your asthma. Contact a doctor if your symptoms are severe or don't improve with treatment.
